column1: Do you need bug spray in April, or just during the summer months?Thanks, Donna
We were there in May and were glad we had bug spray with us. We used it faithfully
Please read the current topics on the chikungunya epidemic. You will definitely want to bring and use bug spray faithfully regardless of the season.
